articles.title: Vigilantes try to scale fence to get to paedophile Gary Glitter - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: The crowd yelled abuse outside the paedophile pop star's halfway house while calling for him to be moved elsewhere.
articles.content:
The crowd called for the disgusting paedophile to be moved elsewhere
An angry crowd sparked a disturbance at the entrance to Gary Glitters halfway house on Sunday afternoon.
